title: BugSplat Crashes
body: As a beginning League of legends player i try to learn more about the game and i strive to reach a high skill level. However, when the game crashes whilst i'm in the champ loading screen i do not get to play the game. Soon after i get placed into the lower priority que pushing me away from the game. Furthermore, i have used every suggestions on the support section of the website, my computer is totally able to carry the game. If anyone can help me please i'm open to suggestions at this point.

replies.body:
Bugsplats are typically the result of funky driver interactions or hardware issues. Following the steps in our [Bugsplat Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes) would by my recommendation for troubleshooting this further.

Let me know if those steps caused any changes.
